title: nThrive rebrands 3 solutions
description: Learn about the 3 solutions nThrive re branded in order to expand the brand in this next article.

title: CMS guidance on data blocking is striking disappointment and fear
description: MACRA holds docs accountable if they intentionally block the sharing of patient information. Guidance meant to provide more clarity on the directive may instead cause fear or frustration among providers.

title: Specialty physicians oppose Medicare advisory council's call to scrap MIPS
description: A specialty group opposes a recent recommendation of the Medicare Payment Advisory Committee to eliminate the complex Merit-Based Incentive Payment System in favor of an alternative payment system.

title: Healthcare industry to create 4 million jobs by 2026
description: The healthcare industry is projected to add 4 million jobs by 2026, led by practitioner positions, support staff sectors and technical occupations.

title: FDA Moves Forward on Breakthrough Med Device Development
description: Read how the FDA is looking to offer innovators the flexibility to make small modifications to medical devices.

title: CMS to Ease Physician Burden, Give More Patient Time
description: New initiative aims to reduce regulatory burden. Learn more here!

title: Learn about CDI and Coder Collaboration- Maximizing Documentation Quality and Revnues at WA ACDIS
description: Sue Muse, Senior Manager, Advisory Services at nThrive, to speak at 9:30-10 AM. Learn more here!

title: There's still time to register for the upcoming nThrive User Forums!
description: User Fourms are one day events designed for clients to increase their knowledge of nThrive. Learn more here!

title: Pilot test will evaluate MACRA's ability to reduce costs
description: The CMS will test eight measures to see whether physicians in the Merit-based Incentive Payment System are cutting spending.

title: Most Providers Report Lack of Health IT Interoperability
description: The majority of providers agree current interoperability solutions fail to meet the needs of value-based care. Learn more in this next article.

title: Learn How Hospitals Are Using Patient-Reported Outcomes to Improve Care
description: Learn the 3 ways hospitals are using patient-reported outcomes in order to improve car in this next article.

title: Learn the 3 strategies for home health success in value-based care
description: While information technology will be an important tool, healthcare organizations must use these tools and the data they provide to enable process changes.

title: FDA Drafts Provisions to Boost Patient Access to Medical Devices
description: FDA has announced new programs and tools that will help developers receive FDA approval for incremental improvements, helping patient access to medical devices.

title: Mitigating patient misidentification in a new era dominated by Medicare Beneficiary Identifiers
description: As the Medicare Access and CHIP Reauthorization Act of 2015 drives sweeping changes in care delivery, reimbursement models and reporting requirements, healthcare leaders are scrambling to understand all of its elements and implications.

title: Options For Alternative Payment Models For Behavioral Health
description: Learn about the eleven identified program models in this next article.

title: Learn About Efficient Health Information Governance and CDI: Benefits Realization
description: Bonnie Cassidy, Managing Director of Advisory Services at nThrive, to speak at Utah ACDIS on November 2nd at 5:30-6:30 PM.

title: Communicate, Improve, and Manage
description: Lincoln Haycock, Sr Manager CDI Consulting at nThrive, to speak on communication, improvement and management at 2:35-3:35 PM.

title: HealthLeaders CEO Exchange: How To Manage MACRA In A Post-MACRA World
description: Moshe Starkman, Senior VBR Consultant at nThrive, to speak at HealthLeaders CEO Exchange on MACRA at 10:30-12 PM.

author.name: North Carolina Healthcare Financial Management Association

title: Learn About Denial Prevention and Management at North Carolina Healthcare Financial Management Association
description: Gina Stinson, VP Managed Care Services, to speak on October 26th at 8-9 AM, 9-10 AM and 10-11 AM on denial prevention and management. Don't miss out!

title: Sending xAPI Statements to an LRS Using JavaScript
description: John Just, VP of Technical and Custom Solutions at nThrive, to speak on sending xAPI Statements to an LRS using JavaScript at DevLearn.

title: RCM tip of the day: Examine data for higher-functioning employed physician practices
description: Kyle Kobe, vice president of consulting/analytics services at nThrive discusses how hospital-employed physician practices and medical groups can achieve improved performance by leveraging data.

title: CMS makes first move to hold docs accountable for Medicare spending
description: The CMS has kick-started an experiment to determine if MACRA will lead to reduced Medicare spending.

title: Utilizing EHRs and educating staff can eliminate wasteful medical tests
description: Researchers from five universities are urging physicians to reconsider their automated habits of ordering costly, often unnecessary lab tests and instead, opt for improved education and EHR use to inform these clinical decisions, based on findings from a recent study.

title: Hospitals aim to decrease spending by limiting high ER utilizers by the helping homeless
description: Hospitals continuously look for ways to decrease spending. One method embraced by some organizations involves helping the homeless. Learn more here!

title: Using Technology to Improve Rural Health Care
description: Learn how technology is improving health care in rural areas in this next article.

title: Cancer recurrence may be stopped with immunotherapy
description: A new study shows how the body's immune system is 'tricked' into not attacking cancer cells, causing relapse.

title: Bundled payment cancellation by CMS draws calls for new Advanced APMs
description: When the previous administration at CMS finalized rules on mandatory bundled payment models for cardiac and orthopedic care late in 2016, 221 public comments were received.  Read more here!

title: Health Innovation Think Tank focuses on forging a path toward value
description: The Health Innovation Think Tank, discussed how healthcare organizations can truly embrace value-based care.

title: The Vital Role of Healthcare Quality Experts
description: This week is dedicated to celebrating the contributions of and increasing awareness about the profession of healthcare quality. Learn more here!

title: Learn 5 ways to use benchmarking to increase physician practice efficiency and profitability
description: Benchmarking taking a look at how your practice compares to others. But it can be hard to know where to start. Click here to learn 5 ways to increase physician practice efficiency and profitability.
